author: bimsebasse
name: Gnome
description:
This is the default gnome-shell theme ported to cinnamon. It may help fedora users get through a transition to cinnamon - it may simply appeal to users who like vanilla gnome-shell aesthetics. 

Font: Cantarell
Wallpaper (scroll down and download the tar.xz folder, it's in there)

It is strongly recommended that you install the Cantarell font as the theme otherwise falls back to the chunky and unattractive Sans-serif font. In Mint/Ubuntu: "sudo apt-get install fonts-cantarell", or look for "Cantarell" in your software manager.

Updates
- Dec 17, 2012: Improved workspaceOSD
- Dec 13, 2012: Updated with gnome-shell 3.7.2.1 changes and slightly polished
